# Patches
Patches are a simple and effective way to slowly administer medication to a patient without risking an overdose. They can be made with the medfab and filled with the chemmaster. They can be directly applied to a patient and will fall off by themselves once empty.
There are 5 types of patches: - Basic - Rapid - Prefilled - Large - Makeshift
## Basic The basic patch holds 40 units of chems and transfers 1 unit at a time.
## Rapid The rapid patch holds 40 units and transfers chemicals twice as fast.
## Prefilled Some medkits contain prefilled patches. These hold 30 units and transfers 0.25 units per second. They cannot be filled or emptied
## Large The large patch holds 60 units and transfers them one unit at a time. However the large patch also transfers 15% of its chemicals upon use (10 units if full).
## Makeshift The makeshift patch can hold 15 units and transfer 1 unit every 2 seconds. However it can be crafted by hand and filled manually without a chemmaster
